user_query: I want to convert 3 cups of flour to grams and 2 ounces of sugar to tablespoons. Can you provide me with the conversion values? Additionally, I'm looking for a specific grocery item. Can you search for 'organic milk' at the nearest grocery store?

TaskList.description: Convert 3 cups of flour to grams using a conversion API.
Convert 2 ounces of sugar to tablespoons using a conversion API.
Search for 'organic milk' at the nearest grocery store using a location-based grocery API.
